data.Name: Joy Gould
data.staff_bio: Joy Orzechowski-Gould has over ten years of experience in workforce development and employment training for the nonprofit and private sectors as well as city government. Her background includes experience in job development for people with significant barriers to employment as well as designing and implementing workplace education programs and customized training programs for employers. She has conducted workplace needs assessments, job task analyses, and career ladder mapping.
data.staff_ed: B.A., Public Relations and Business, Mount Saint Mary College
